definition: not derived from or reducible to something else, a preliminary election where delegates or nominees are chosen
details:
adjective
- not derived from or reducible to something else
- of primary importance
= synonyms: basal
- of first rank or importance or value
- of or being the essential or basic part
= synonyms: elementary, elemental
- most important element
= synonyms: main
noun
- a preliminary election where delegates or nominees are chosen
= synonyms: primary election
- one of the main flight feathers projecting along the outer edge of a bird's wing
= synonyms: primary feather, primary quill
- coil forming the part of an electrical circuit such that changing current in it induces a current in a neighboring circuit
= example: coil forming the part of an electrical circuit such that changing current in it induces a current in a neighboring circuit
= synonyms: primary coil, primary winding
- (astronomy) a celestial body (especially a star) relative to other objects in orbit around it
